body: You're right, there's something fishy. Having a closer look.

issue.title: Make sure we append the current buffer before appending the title
issue.body:
The title ended up being added first, which was definitely not what we wanted.

Fixes #42036

body: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/42039 will fix it. I'll merge when CI is green and backport it too.
Sorry about that, not sure how I missed this and how it went unnoticed for so long...
No worries. Thanks for fixing it.

> Sorry about that, not sure how I missed this and how it went unnoticed for so long...

The insertion of the dynamically-generated ID only becomes obvious when one shadow-publishes the product guides and runs a tool to validate links between guides.

issue.title: [3.8] Fix downstream title
issue.body:
The title ended up being added first, which was definitely not what we wanted.

Fixes #42036

(cherry picked from commit 6dc20b6084b3fa5a8c2741f5c139236f4ff26dbe)
